summary: dragons cant use kill moves on the player. tested by fighting an ancient dragon on four different saves, including a level one character. dragons will NEVER use a kill move on the player. it is IMPOSSIBLE for a dragon to use a kill move on the player.
descriptionHtml:
dragons cant use kill moves on the player. tested by fighting an ancient dragon on four different saves, including a level one character. dragons will NEVER use a kill move on the player. put the .esp in the skyrim data folder.

Version 1.3
Dragons will only use a kill move if the target is NOT the player. it is IMPOSSIBLE for a dragon to use a kill move on the player.

added optional file that stops the player from using a kill move on a dragon.
author: qaz099
